inclusion.criterion: candidates to renal replacement therapy using the extended dialysis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: guaranteed that half of them will start in the citrate group and the other half in the control group
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: randomization process determine the type of anticoagulation that the patient will be submitted in the first dialysis session
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients will be excluded if they present: I) acute liver failure; II) hemorrhagic stroke in the last 30 days; III) platelet levels below 20,000/mm3 and IV) active bleeding requiring transfusion of two or more red blood cell packs within 24 hours
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: decisions about the need for renal replacement therapy, modality and time will be made by the nephrologist attendant
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all slow extended dialysis (SLED) in this trial were performed in 6 to 8 hours using a single-pass batch machine
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: dialysate solution after proper reconstitution has sodium 138 mEq/l, bicarbonate 32.6 mEq/l, magnesium 1.0 mEq/l, chloride 111 mEq/l, potassium 2.0 or 3.0 mEq/l and calcium 2.5 mEq/l
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: citrate dose was tailored to achieve 3 mmol per filtered blood liter using a citric acid solution 2.2% 800 ml bag
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: calcium replacement began if the patient has a serum ionized calcium less than 4.4 mg/dl before it starts or during the session
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: blood samples at every two hours to adjust the calcium infusion rate targeting serum calcium from 4.4 to 5.3 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the post filter ionized calcium was measured and adjusted accordingly
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: hemorrhagic stroke in the last 30 days
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: active bleeding requiring transfusion of two or more red blood cell packs within 24 hours
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday, with a history of abdominal pain followed by bloating and nausea. He was living in a camp in Sudan for a month before returning to the clinic.
